name: Rotnik
description:
This is a prototype made in java of an idea that we were developing. The idea was to create a turn based strategy game with more than 4 characters per faction. 

The prototype is a .jar and it is functional, but it is only in spanish as... well, it was a prototype and it was just for internal purposes. 

This prototype consist on a battle between heroes (2 copies of each hero) and a necromancer (necromancer + zombies).

Credits: 

Programming and coding: Aurelio Fernandez Moreno

Music: Pedro López Pastor

Art: Ramón Lez

Game Design: José María Cano Romero
